meanings.sent1: The cloggiest drain in the house was completely blocked.
meanings.sent2: The sink was at its cloggiest point, making it hard to wash dishes.
meanings.sent3: The cloggiest part of the traffic jam was right near the construction site.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like the cloggiest maze, full of dead ends and confusion.
meanings.sent5: The cloggiest pipe in the plumbing system caused a major leak.

meanings.definition: Cloggiest: most likely to cause a blockage or obstruction
meanings.sent1: The cloggiest material for the filter prevented any water from passing through.
meanings.sent2: Leaves from the tree created the cloggiest mess in the gutter.
meanings.sent3: The cloggiest tree roots seemed determined to crack the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was like the cloggiest boulder, blocking any compromise.
meanings.sent5: The cloggiest section of the river was where debris gathered after heavy rain.
